1250:7: asmin vānyadapohyata iti vyutpattyā vijātivyāvṛttaṃ bāhyameva vivakṣitam |
1250:9: yadi vā apohanamapoha ityanyavyāvṛttimātram iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ |
1250:14: tathā hi parvatoddeśe vahnirastīti śābdī pratītirvidhirūpamevollikhantī lakṣyate |
1250:16: yacca pratyakṣabādhitaṃ na tatra sādhanāntarāvakāśaḥ ityatiprasiddham ||
1250:17: atha yadyapi nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemīti na vikalpaḥ tathāpi nivṛttapadārthollekha eva nivṛttyullekhaḥ |
1250:19: tato yathā sāmānyamahaṃ pratyemīti vikalpābhāve'pi sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇād vikalpabuddhiḥ sāmānyabuddhiḥ pareṣām,
1250:23: tato nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyevamākārābhāve'pi nivṛttyākārasphuraṇaṃ yadi syāt ko nāma nivṛttipratītisthitimapalapet |
1250:24: anyathā asati pratibhāse tatpratītivyavahṛtiriti gavākāre'pi cetasi turagabodha ityastu |
1250:26: tathāpi yadyagavāpoḍha itīdṛśākāro vikalpastadā viśeṣaṇatayā tadanupraveśo bhavatu kiṃ tu gauriti pratītiḥ |
1250:27: tadā ca sato'pi nivṛttilakṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇasya tatrānutkalanāt kathaṃ tatpratītivyavasthā |
1250:28: athaivaṃ matiḥ- yad vidhirūpaṃ sphurati tasya parāpoho'pyastīti tatpratītirucyate |
1250:32: tasmādvidhyākārāvagrahādadhyakṣavad vikalpasyāpi vidhiviṣayatvameva nānyāpohaviṣayatvamiti kathamapohaḥ śabdārtho ghuṣyate |
1250:38: yattu goḥ pratītau na tadātmāparātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam,
1250:39: anyāpohapratītau vā sāmarthyādanyāpoḍho'vadhāryate iti pratiṣedhavādināṃ matam |
1250:42: na hi vidhiṃ pratipadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati |
1250:47: yathā nīlotpale niveśitādindīvaraśabdānnīlotpalapratītau tatkāla eva nīlimasphuraṇamanivāryaṃ tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍhe niveśitād gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvādago'pohasphuraṇamanivāryam |
1250:50: anyathā yadi śabdādarthapratipattikāle kalito na parāpohaḥ kathamanyaparihāreṇa pravṛttiḥ |
1250:52: yadapyavocad vācaspatiḥ jātimatyo vyaktayo vikalpānāṃ śabdānāṃ ca gocaraḥ |
1250:53: tāsāṃ ca tadvatīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttamityatastadavagaterna gāṃ badhāneti codito'śvādīn badhnāti |
1250:55: yato jāteradhikāyāḥ prakṣepe'pi vyaktīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttameva cet,
1250:57: atha na vijātīyavyāvṝttaṃ vyaktirūpaṃ tathāpratītaṃ vā tadā jātiprasāda eṣa iti kathamarthato'pi tadavagatirityuktaprāyam |
1250:69: tasmādekapiṇḍadarśanapūrvako yaḥ sarvavyaktisādhāraṇa iva bahiraghyasto vikalpabuddhyākāraḥ tatrāyaṃ gauriti saṃketakaraṇe netaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ |
1250:76: eṣa panthāḥ śrughnamupatiṣṭhata ityatrāpyapoho gamyata eva |
1250:79: sārthadūtādivyavacchedena panthā eveti pratipadaṃ vyavacchedasya sulabhatvāt |
1250:80: tasmādapohadharmaṇo vidhirūpasya śabdādavagatiḥ puṇḍarīkaśabdādiva śvetimaviśiṣṭasya padmasya ||
1250:99: na hi spaṣṭāspaṣṭe dve rūpe parasparaviruddhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ |
1250:105: dūrāsannadeśavartinoḥ puruṣayorekatra śākhini spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsabhede'pi na śākhibheda iti cet |
1250:110: etena yadāha vācaspatiḥ - na ca śābdapratyakṣayorvastugocaratve pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteriti,
1250:116: kiṃ ca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvātmanā pratipatteḥ vidhiniṣedhayorayogaḥ |
1250:122: tasmāt śābdapratibhāsasya bāhyārthabhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ na tadviṣayatāṃ kṣamate ||
1250:123: yacca vācaspatinā jātimadvyaktivācyatāṃ svavācaiva prastutyāntarameva na ca śabdārthasya jāterbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ nopapadyate |
1250:130: jātau bharaṃ nyasyatā svalakṣaṇavācyatvasya svayaṃ svīkārāt |
1250:134: vyakteścet pratītisiddhiḥ jātiradhikā pratīyatāṃ mā vā,
1250:136: etena yaducyate kaumārilaiḥ sabhāgatvādeva vastuno na sādhāraṇyadoṣaḥ |
1250:141: yaccedam - na ca pratyakṣasyeva śabdānāmarthapratyāyanaprakāro yena taddṛṣṭa ivāstyādiśabdāpekṣā na syāt,
1250:145: tato yadi pratyakṣārthapratipādanaṃ śābdena tadvadevāvabhāsaḥ syāt |
1250:147: nanu vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe codite sattvādyaṃśaniścayanārthamastyādipadaprayoga iti cet |
1250:152: vikalpastu svayaṃ niścayātmako yatra grāhī tatra kimapareṇa |
1250:155: nanu bhinnā jātyādayo dharmāḥ parasparaṃ dharmiṇaśceti jātilakṣaṇaikadharmadvāreṇa pratīte'pi śākhini dharmāntaravattayā na pratītiriti kiṃ na bhinnābhidhānādhīno dharmāntarasya nīlacaloccaistaratvāderavabodhaḥ |
1250:163: evaṃ ca yathendriyapratyāsattyā pratyakṣeṇa dharmipratipattau sakalataddharmapratipattistathā śabdaliṅgābhyāmapi vācyavācakādisaṃbandhapratibaddhābhyāṃ dharmipratipattau niravaśeṣataddharmapratipattirbhavet |
1250:166: na caikopādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte upādhyantaraviśiṣṭastadgrahaḥ |
1250:168: na tūpādhayo vā viśeṣyatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāva iti |
1250:172: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva iva svabhāvata eva dharmadharmiṇoḥ pratipattiniyamakalpanamucitam |
1250:178: upakāralakṣaṇaiva ca pratyāsattistadopakārakagrahaṇe samānadeśasyaiva dharmarūpasyaiva copakāryasya grahaṇamāsañjitam |
1250:179: tatkathaṃ sūryopakāryasya bhinnadeśasya dravyāntarasya vā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ |
1250:180: tasmādekadharmadvāreṇāpi vastusvarūpapratipattau sarvātmapratīteḥ kva śabdāntareṇa vidhiniṣedhāvakāśaḥ |
1250:184: saritaḥ pāre gāvaścarantīti gavādiśabdāt sāsnāśṛṅgalāṅgūlādayo'kṣarākāraparikaritāḥ sajātīyabhedāparāmarśanāt sampiṇḍitaprāyāḥ pratibhāsante |
1250:187: tadeva ca sāsnāśṛṅgādimātramakhilavyaktāvatyantavilakṣaṇamapi svalakṣaṇenaikīkriyamāṇaṃ sāmānyamityucyate tādṛśasya bāhyasyāprāpterbhrāntirevāsau keśapratibhāsavat |
1250:190: vyaktaya eva vā svajātīyabhedatiraskāreṇānyathā bhāsantāmanubhavavyavadhānāt smṛtipramoṣo vābhidhīyatām |
1250:195: tadevaṃ na śābde pratyaye jātiḥ pratibhāti |
1250:199: nāpondriyavadasyāḥ siddhiḥ jñānakāryataḥ kādācitkasyaiva nimittāntarasya siddheḥ |
1250:200: yadā piṇḍāntare antarāle vā gobuddherabhāvaṃ darśayet tadā śāvaleyādisakalagopiṇḍānāmevābhāvādabhāvo gobuddherupapadyamānaḥ kathamarthāntaramākṣipet |
1250:203: yadyevaṃ gopiṇḍādeva gotvamanyathā turagatvamapi gotvaṃ syāt |
1250:204: tasmāt kāraṇaparamparāta eva gopiṇḍo gotvaṃ tu bhavatu mā vā |
1250:205: nanu sāmānyapratyayajananasāmarthyaṃ yadyekasmāt piṇḍādabhinnaṃ tadā vijātīyavyāvṝttaṃ piṇḍāntaramasamartham |
1250:210: yathā tvekaḥ śaktasvabhāvo bhāvastathānyo'pi bhavan kīdṛśaṃ doṣamāvahati |
1250:213: tathāsmākaṃ vyaktirapi jātinirapekṣā svarūpeṇaiva bhinnā hetuḥ ||
1250:214: yattu trilocanaḥ -aśvatvagotvādīnāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ svāśraye samavāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyamityabhidhānapratyayayornimittamiti | yadyevaṃ
1250:222: etena seyaṃ pratyayānuvṛttiranuvṛttavastvanuyāyinī kathamatyantabhedinīṣu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛttaviṣayapratyayabhāvānupātinīṣu bhavitumarhatītyūhāpravartanamasya pratyākhyātam |
1250:229: tulye bhede yayā jātiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati |
1250:231: yat punaratra nyāyabhūṣaṇoktaṃ na hyevaṃ bhavati,
1250:232: yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍasūtrādikaṃ prasarpati kvacinnānyatra saiva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣasphaṭikādiṣu daṇḍisūtritvādivyavahāranibandhanamastu,
1250:235: daṇḍasūtrayorhi puruṣasphaṭikapratyāsannayoḥ dṛṣṭayo daṇḍisūtritva pratyayahetutvaṃ nāpalapyate |
1250:237: tad yadīdaṃ parikalpanīyaṃ tadā varaṃ pratyāsattireva sāmānyapratyayahetuḥ parikalpyatām,
1250:253: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvajātimān piṇḍa iti parikalpitaṃ bhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyeṣṭatvādagovyāvṛttānubhavabhāvitvād gaurayamiti vyavahārasya |
1250:255: bādhakaṃ ca sāmānyaguṇakarmādyupādhicakrasya kevalavyaktigrāhakaṃ paṭupratyakṣaṃ dṛśyānupalambho vā prasiddhaḥ |
1250:258: tatra na buddhyākārasya tattvataḥ saṃvṛtyā vā vidhiniṣedhau,
1250:267: bahireva hi saṃvṛtyā saṃvṛtyāpi tu nākṛteḥ ||
1250:268: etena yad dharmottaraḥ āropitasya bāhyatvasya vidhiniṣedhāvityalaukikamanāgamamatārkikīyaṃ kathayati,
1250:270: nanvavyavasāye yadyadhyavaseyaṃ vastu na sphurati tadā tadadhyavasitamiti ko'rthaḥ |
1250:272: apratibhāsāviśeṣe viṣayāntaraparihāreṇa kathaṃ niyataviṣayā pravṛttiriti cet |
1250:274: yadyapi viśvamagṛhītaṃ tathāpi vikalpasya niyatasāmagrīprasūtatvena niyatākāratayā,
1250:277: niyataviṣayā hi bhāvāḥ pramāṇapariniṣṭhitasvabhāvā na śaktisāṃkaryaparyanuyogabhājaḥ |
1250:280: yenākāre bāhyasya bāhye vā ākārasyāropadvāreṇa dūṣaṇābakāśaḥ |
1250:281: kiṃ tarhi svavāsanāvipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva buddhirapaśyantyapi bāhyaṃ bāhye pravṛttimātanotīti viplutaiva |
1250:283: sa eva cāpohaśabdavācyaḥ śabdānāmarthaḥ pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayaśceti sthitam |
1250:301: tadevaṃ vācyāntarasyābhāvāt viṣayavattvalakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣato nivarttamānaṃ vācakatvamadhyavasitabāhyaviṣayatvena vyāpyata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ |
